formattedAddress: 41 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 41 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Sophisticated French cooking presented in chic, airy environs with salvaged-wood beams.

originalText.text:
Probably the best duck I had in New York?

Went to this place to celebrate getting a new job. We got the tasting menu and we enjoyed a lot. The duck is probably the best I had in New York. Generally the portion is big but the dishes were paced very well. Service is impeccable too. Would love to come back and try the new menu.

text.text:
Probably the best duck I had in New York?

Went to this place to celebrate getting a new job. We got the tasting menu and we enjoyed a lot. The duck is probably the best I had in New York. Generally the portion is big but the dishes were paced very well. Service is impeccable too. Would love to come back and try the new menu.

originalText.text: Nice place, great service , disappointing food! We had tasting menu, that included few small bites, all of them are simple and boring. Then uncooked ravioli, “do it yourself “ fajitas that were average minus and a perfect duck dish. Deserts were nice. All in all it was a nice experience but doesn’t worth the money at all. It is not a matter of the cost, it is a matter of waisting an evening in NY for such food instead of enjoying a much better Michelin restaurant.

text.text: Nice place, great service , disappointing food! We had tasting menu, that included few small bites, all of them are simple and boring. Then uncooked ravioli, “do it yourself “ fajitas that were average minus and a perfect duck dish. Deserts were nice. All in all it was a nice experience but doesn’t worth the money at all. It is not a matter of the cost, it is a matter of waisting an evening in NY for such food instead of enjoying a much better Michelin restaurant.

originalText.text: The duck was so delicious: the meat was tender paired with crispy skin you have to get it, but the Foie gras was not that great and overly filling, I wouldn't get it again. The decor inside the restaurant is also very nice. The brioche bread with pistachio butter is one of the highlights for me because the bread was soft with a buttery taste. The dessert is a bit on the sweeter side, so I would recommend getting something other than the chocolate truffle. By the end of the meal, I felt overly full… but everything tasted fantastic.

text.text: The duck was so delicious: the meat was tender paired with crispy skin you have to get it, but the Foie gras was not that great and overly filling, I wouldn't get it again. The decor inside the restaurant is also very nice. The brioche bread with pistachio butter is one of the highlights for me because the bread was soft with a buttery taste. The dessert is a bit on the sweeter side, so I would recommend getting something other than the chocolate truffle. By the end of the meal, I felt overly full… but everything tasted fantastic.

originalText.text:
This was a memorable dining experience. They do an excellent job of making the evening an ongoing experience with small bites and beautifully plated dishes- from the Bundt bread bowl to serving on hot stones or ganache set in a cocoa fruit pod.

Our service was mindful of the time constraints for our meal and perfectly coordinated each dish without delay or rushing the next course. They paced our evening flawlessly.

I found the culinary artistry to be delightful.

Our service was mindful of the time constraints for our meal and perfectly coordinated each dish without delay or rushing the next course. They paced our evening flawlessly.

I found the culinary artistry to be delightful.

originalText.text: I picked this spot to propose to my girlfriend and couldn’t be any happier with the way it turned out. From the minute I called to make reservations and explain the situation they were very accommodating. We decided to have the chefs choice and the 7 course meal felt like 9 courses with all the different things in between. The presentation and description of the food by the staff was amazing. When it came time to propose the staff helped me with surprising her and even went above and beyond by offering to help me video our special moment. We were so taken back by the whole experience I didn’t even think about taking pictures throughout the dinner. Definitely an experience to remember forcer 100 stars!!!
